title: Kalshi Claims 'Extortion,' Then Recants in Feud Over User Losses
full_text: Kalshi Claims 'Extortion,' Then Recants in Feud Over User Losses. Kalshi, the largest U.S. prediction market, accused a small data startup called Juice Reel of "extortion" after a stock analyst used the company's transaction-level data to argue that prediction market users lose money faster than gamblers on traditional bett….
